HelpBalloon.title: Date format
HelpBalloon.content:
Select the date format you use for formatting your date fields.
The specification of the date format for your import profile is made by the JAVA SimpleDateFormat. For example the following strings are possible: YYYY (year, e.g. 1986), MM (month, e.g. 07), dd (day within a month, e.g. 10), HH (hour within a day, e.g. 04), mm (minutes within a hour, e.g. 30), ss (seconds within a minute, e.g. 20) or also for am and pm. The specification YYYY-MM-dd, HH:mm could be used for the following date 2017-01-10, 08:30.
